titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PERSON DEATH YEAR AND MONTH (POST DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) - Description

div.p: PERSON DEATH YEAR AND MONTH (POST DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) is the year and month of the recorded PERSON DEATH DATE of a baby/child following discharge from a neonatal CRITICAL CARE PERIOD.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment, PERSON DEATH YEAR AND MONTH (POST DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) is submitted instead of PERSON DEATH DATE (POST DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE), where the data set record is anonymised.

PERSON DEATH YEAR AND MONTH (POST DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) is recorded if the TWO YEAR NEONATAL OUTCOMES ASSESSMENT NOT CARRIED OUT REASON is '
PATIENT
deceased post discharge from Neonatal Critical Care'.
